name: 拯救破败祖业
description:
"Save bankrupt ancestral industry" is a business game, players need to reasonably allocate the hands of resources used to operate the loss of the restaurant, the purpose is to eventually through a variety of means to make the store to profit, and successfully save their own industry, so as to achieve the outcome of love and career double harvest.

Low low STORY (STORY)
Drifted out years of protagonist finally eliminated by the hustle and bustle of big cities, ready to return home business to do a plain three generations of rich sick grandfather gave his business restaurant to hope he can keep the leading role, but I didn't think the restaurant is already in debt, I suddenly from the rich three generations, three generations into negative dunner outside already at this moment, And the leading role how to solve the ensuing crisis to save their ancestors......

Low characteristics (FEATURES) is low
※ Hundreds of thousands of words of large capacity text story, more than business lines + multiple endings.
* Dubbing all characters in the game.
※ Nearly 100 exquisite vertical paintings.
※ High standard performance.
* Character numerical system and numerous options for gameplay.
